name: Foodera
overview:
Foodies have a reason to rejoice. Foodera.in, an online food ordering website bridges the gap between the customers and the restaurant owners.

Now with the help of Foodera, you can easily satisfy your hunger pangs, at any odd hour. Foodera allows the users to browse through any restaurant of their choice in any particular Delhi-NCR based location. And that’s not all, Foodera allows the users to make the right choice, by displaying the reviews of the other foodies.

Ordering the food of your choice through Foodera is amazingly effortless. All you have to do is, find your favorite restaurant, select your favorite food from online menu, place the order online and your order would be on your doorstep within few minutes.

Say goodbye to clumsy order placements, effortlessly place the order of your food via Foodera and just chill till the food is delivered at your doorstep.
